com.pasdam.regexren.gui

Class RuleContentPanel<T extends AbstractRuleFactory>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • com.pasdam.regexren.gui.RuleContentPanel<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LocaleManager.Localizable, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChangeCasePanel, InsertCounterAtPositionPanel, InsertCounterBeforeAfterPanel, InsertCounterOnCollisionPanel, InsertTextAtPositionPanel, InsertTextBeforeAfterPanel, MoveTextBeforeAfterPanel, RemovePanel, ReplacePanel

    public abstract class RuleContentPanel<T extends AbstractRuleFactory>
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements LocaleManager.Localizable

    All rule panels must extends this class.

    Derived class must call #configurationChanged() whenever their content changes

    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    paco
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
